item.title: WATCH: Trump ends Canada trade talks over anti-tariff ad
item.description: President Donald Trump said he's terminating trade negotiations with Canada, citing a negative TV advertisement about tariffs.

item.title: Here's when Melissa could strengthen into powerful Category 4 storm
item.description: Tropical Storm Melissa is expected to bring catastrophic flash flooding and landslides to parts of the Dominican Republic, Haiti and Jamaica.

item.title: Trump likely to name White House ballroom after himself, officials say
item.description: Trump has not publicly said what he intends to name the ballroom, but officials say it's already being referred to as "The President Donald J. Trump B...

item.title: WATCH: Trump likely to name White House ballroom after himself, officials say
item.description: President Donald Trump will likely name his new $300 million White House ballroom after himself, according to senior administration officials.

item.title: WATCH: High-tech cheating devices allegedly used in NBA gambling scandal
item.description: Here's a look at how the alleged fraudsters rigged poker games, according to an unsealed indictment and announcement from federal officials.
